response.overview: Maniacs with carving knives, unstoppable psychos with machetes, cannibals with chainsaws! They are all here at the Slash-O-Rama Drive-In! The Celluloid Coffin pays tribute to one of the greatest horror genres: The Slasher Film. Packed with trailers that will grab you by the throat and thrust a rusty, sharp implement through your gut! Plus, classic drive-in theatre ads guaranteed to make you take a trip to your own private concession stand. Turn down the lights and grab your favorite girl because madness is about to begin!
response.title: CoffinDan's Slash-O-Rama Drive-In
